title: A HELP IS REQUIRED ABOUT TRANSFERING SERVERS PLEASE HELP
body: hello friends , i an currently playing on NA server from India and i am getting 350-450 ping , so i am planning to move to garena singapore servers . Is there any way to transfer my account to garena ?????/

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct. Because the Singapore servers are operated and supported by [**Garena**](https://lol.garena.com/home), you're unable to transfer your NA account to any Garena-operated regions.

If you have any other questions, please let me know.
Garena is their own region and you can't [transfer ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ)an NA account to it.
